content:
Imap accounts? Or pop?

Please start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode

Still In Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem change - better or worse?
creator: wsmwk

content: Put the 25 contacts in a new address book, then create a filter with the rule From + is in my address book + <select the new address book>. New contacts can be added to this address book by clicking the icon in the message header, then clicking it again to specify the new address book.
creator: sfhowes

content: Yes, many people are using it. Myself included, on two machines. That is not to say that there are zero problems. But there are no major problems that I am aware of.
creator: wsmwk

content: Open Classic Search (Ctrl+Shift+F) as in the attached picture, then select all the results (Ctrl+A), then Move To and choose the archive folder.
